title: Riot is like all the people in our ranked matches

replies.body: lol, I don't think Riot realizes that if they don't listen and fix their game soon, people will just leave and go play over-watch. Iv'e already seen tons of people say they're playing less League and more over-watch. (Youtubers included) League Dying is definitely a legit  thing if they lose too many veterans and players too fast.
